casebody.data:
Gaspar v. Guenther et al.; City of Sheffield Lake et al., Appellants; McCullough, Appellee.

[Cite as Gaspar v. Guenther, 122 Ohio St.3d 34, 2009-Ohio-2363.]

(No. 2008-1869 Submitted May 19, 2009 Decided May 27, 2009.) Mansour, Gavin, Gerlack & Manos Co., L.P.A., and John F. Burke III, for appellee. Weston Hurd, L.L.P., and Shawn W. Maestle, for appellants.

{¶ 1} This cause was held for the decision in Walburn v. Dunlap, 121 Ohio St.3d 373, 2009-Ohio-1221, 904 N.E.2d 863.

{¶ 2} Because the court of appeals properly applied Gen. Acc. Ins. Co. v. Ins. Co. of N. Am. (1989), 44 Ohio St.3d 17, 540 N.E.2d 266, the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
